quickAdd.hint:
Start typing
Tab to fill field
Enter to add statement

budget.name: Name
budget.hintDeleteDisabled: This budget item is used, therefore cannot be deleted

amountHint.label: Advanced amount
amountHint.description:
[cur_month | prev_month]: Current month or previous month
[.account(<accountId>)]: Optional account specification using account id
.[
leftFromPrevMonth: Left from previous month
totalIncome: Total of type 'Income'
totalSpending: Total of type 'Spending'
totalLoanReturn: Total of type 'Loan return'
totalSavings: Total of type 'Savings'
totalToOtherAccount: Total of type 'Transfer to other account'
totalFromOtherAccount: Total of type 'Transfer from other account'
totalKeepOnAccount: Total of type 'Keep on account'
openingBalance: = leftFromPrevMonth + totalIncome + totalFromOtherAccount
totalSpendings: = totalSpending + totalLoanReturn + totalSavings
closingBalance: = openingBalance - totalSpendings - totalToOtherAccount
getItem(<budgetId>): Gets amount of a specific budget item
getDaysInMonth(): Gets total of calendar days in a month (1 - 31)
getWeekdaysInMonth([1..7]): Gets total of a certain weekday in a month (e.g. getWeekdaysInMonth(2) = Tuesdays in a month)
]

account.name: Name
account.hintDeleteDisabled: This account is used, therefore cannot be deleted

demo.topBarMessage: You are using demo data! The data is not saved and may be lost. Feel free to play around and change anything.

errors.passwordInvalid: Password cannot be less than 8 characters long
errors.emailExists: User with this email address already exists

welcome.text2: Keep and track your personal finance records, setup budget rules, plan purchases.

about.text1: Keep track of your spending habits. Improve your financial planning. Set budget goals.
about.text2: This tool is meant for personal use and is not aimed at companies.

openSource.text: Project is open source. Feel free to review the code, submit bug reports and request functionalilty on our

private.text: Your data is your own. The data is encrypted before it leaves your device. We will not share, sell or even see your data.

newsletter.text: If you want to receive news about the tool, you can subscribe to our newsletter (TBA)

privacy.text1: Your data is yours. We will not share it with anyone.
privacy.text2: Our database stores in plain text only your e-mail. The rest is encrypted before it leaves your device.
privacy.text3: Anything we store on your device is related to functionality of the site only.
